statements: DELETE FROM hotel_guests WHERE room_number = 201 AND check_in_date = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM hotel_guests WHERE guest_id = 100 AND room_number = 101;
DELETE FROM hotel_guests WHERE room_type = 'suite' AND check_in_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM booking_details WHERE room_number = 101 AND check_in_date = '2023-01-15';
DELETE FROM room_preferences WHERE smoking_allowed = TRUE;
DELETE FROM hotel_reviews WHERE rating < 3 AND guest_id IN (SELECT guest_id FROM guest_info WHERE guest_name LIKE 'J%');
DELETE FROM rooms WHERE status = 'Under Maintenance';
